h1_title: How to Unlock the Chapter 2 Secret Area
h2_title: How to Get the Sobering Stone for the Yellow-Robed Squire - Method 2
content: To help him, you'll need to beat the Mother of Stones boss you can find up the stairs to the left just before Rockrest Flat Keeper's Shrine. Defeating the Mother of Stones will grant you the Stone Essence key item you'll need to hand over to the Man-in-Stone.

The content is as follows:
To help him, you'll need to beat the Mother of Stones boss you can find up the stairs to the left just before Rockrest Flat Keeper's Shrine. Defeating the Mother of Stones will grant you the Stone Essence key item you'll need to hand over to the Man-in-Stone.
